comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Edmund Stairs Twining (1892-1969) of Long Island married Ursula Wolcott Brown (1891-1967) in 1914. They had sons Edmund Jr., born September 1915 (d. 2004), and Geoffrey, born 1923 (d. 1984). Edmund Jr. was a decorated WWII veteran, and his remains are at Arlington: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=49329811 ww2.fairfaxtimes.com/cms/archivestory.php?id=177722 Ursula was the daughter of George Hunter Brown and Cornelia Emily Moss.
